staticherobanner.description: If you have questions, we have answers.

terms_landing.heading: FAQs
terms_landing.termslist:
[{"termstitle":"What is your Refer-a-Friend program?"\,"termsdescription":"

The Ohio Natural Gas Refer-a-Friend program allows current ONG customers to earn credits on their bill when they refer their friends who enroll with GNG
\\n

\\n"},{"termstitle":"How much can I earn? How do I get rewarded for referring my friends?"\,"termsdescription":"

The Georgia Natural Gas Refer-a-Friend program allows current GNG customers to earn credits on their bill when they refer their friends who enroll with GNG
\\n

\\n"},{"termstitle":"How do I get my personal Referral Code?"\,"termsdescription":"

\\n
